units.title: Organoid culture and drug sensitivity assay
units.text: N.Sa. generated organoid cultures and performed drug sensitivity assays.
units.rationale: Describes the creation of organoid cultures and testing drug responses.

units.title: Assistance with drug sensitivity assays
units.text: D.A.E. provided assistance with drug sensitivity assays.
units.rationale: Indicates support provided for the drug testing procedures.

units.title: Sequencing data analysis and interpretation
units.text: S.F.R. and H.L.-S. analysed and interpreted the sequencing data.
units.rationale: Specifies the analytical step for genomic sequencing results.

units.title: Methylation data analysis and interpretation
units.text: S.F.R. and M.D.Y. analysed and interpreted methylation
units.rationale: Details the processing of DNA methylation information.

units.title: Phylogeny derivation
units.rationale: Outlines the construction of evolutionary trees from data.

units.title: Signature analysis
units.rationale: Indicates execution of mutational signature profiling.

units.title: Figure generation
units.rationale: Describes creation of visual representations for the study.

units.title: Statistical analysis contribution
units.text: H.L., S.G. and P.J.C. contributed to statistical analyses.
units.rationale: Notes involvement in quantitative data evaluation.

units.title: Availability of WNT‑sensitive cells
units.text: rendered cells highly sensitive to the WNT secretion/porcupine are available in the online version of the paper at https://doi.org/10.1038/s41586-018-0024-3.
units.rationale: Provides a resource for reproducing WNT‑related experiments.
